title: ngVikings 2019 - The legendary Angular conference in the Nordics. May 27-28th, Copenhagen, Denmark
description: Having Angular team members, Google Developer Experts and legendary international speakers onboard, ngVikings Conference guarantees an excellent program: fresh, technically deep and 100% useful.

ticketsBlock.ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks, lunch and party. All prices INCLUDE VAT 25%. Want to pay with invoice? Email contact@ngvikings.org

galleryBlock.title: ngVikings 2018
galleryBlock.description: What makes ngVikings so special? A spirit! Openness, friendliness, fun are must have addons to the technical sessions at our conference. You will meet your old friends there. And you will make lots of new friends!

team.description:
ngVikings is a 100% community-driven event comprised of many Nordic Angular groups with more than 3500 active members in total:
  • AngularJS Copenhagen
  • GDG Copenhagen
  • AngularJS Oslo
  • AngularJS Gothenburg
  • ngAarhus
  • ngStockholm
  • Angular Finland

blocks.title: What is ngVikings?
blocks.description: ngVikings is a community-driven Angular conference travelling across the Nordic countries. The third ngVikings event is scheduled for the 27th & 28th of May in Copenhagen, Denmark. This event will gather 400+ front-end developers from different countries together. It's the largest Angular conference hosted in the Nordic countries. The talks and workshops will be mostly about Angular and other technologies related to the Angular framework. ngVikings operates as a non-profit organization.
